references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduced the Neural Radiance Field (NeRF) concept, which is foundational to many of the techniques discussed in this paper.

references.paper_title: Instant neural graphics primitives with a multiresolution hash encoding
references.reason: This paper presented Instant-NGP, a highly efficient method for NeRF rendering, which is compared against in this paper's results.

references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This work is a foundational paper in diffusion models that the current paper builds upon for 3D generation.

references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduced 3D Gaussian Splatting (3DGS), which is directly extended in this paper's proposed GaussianCube representation.

references.paper_title: Rodin: A generative model for sculpting 3d digital avatars using diffusion
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant as it is a previous work by some of the same authors, focusing on 3D avatar generation, a task also addressed in this current paper.
